text: Florijana Ismaili (1 January 1995 â€“ 29 June 2019) was a Swiss footballer. She played as a forward. She captained BSC YB Frauen in the Women's Nationalliga A and played for the Switzerland national team. She started playing for the national team in 2014 and was part of her country's squad at the 2015 FIFA Women's World Cup. 29 June 2019, Ismaili went missing while swimming at Lake Como in Tuscany, northern Italy. On 2 July, her dead body was found in the lake. ==References== ==Other websites== *Florijana Ismaili at FIFA.com Category:1995 births Category:2019 deaths Category:Deaths by drowning Category:Female footballers Category:Swiss footballers Category:Sportspeople from the canton of Bern
title: Florijana Ismaili
